short.ar: اختبر مهاراتك في Bicycle Rider Simulator المليئة بالمهام المثيرة.

short.bg: Тествайте уменията си в Bicycle Rider Simulator, пълен с вълнуващи мисии.

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Test your skills in Bicycle Rider Simulator full of exciting missions.

short.gu: આકર્ષક મિશનથી ભરેલા સાયકલ રાઇડર સિમ્યુલેટરમાં તમારી કુશળતાનું પરીક્ષણ કરો.
short.he: בחן את כישוריך בסימולטור רוכב אופניים מלא במשימות מרגשות.
short.hi: रोमांचक मिशन से भरे साइकिल राइडर सिम्युलेटर में अपने कौशल का परीक्षण करें।
short.hr: Testirajte svoje vještine u simulatoru biciklista punom uzbudljivih misija.
short.hu: Tedd próbára képességeidet az izgalmas küldetésekkel teli Bicycle Rider Simulatorban.

short.ja: エキサイティングなミッションでいっぱいの自転車ライダーシミュレーターであなたのスキルをテストしてください。
short.kn: ಅತ್ಯಾಕರ್ಷಕ ಕಾರ್ಯಾಚರಣೆಗಳಿಂದ ತುಂಬಿದ ಬೈಸಿಕಲ್ ರೈಡರ್ ಸಿಮ್ಯುಲೇಟರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಕೌಶಲ್ಯಗಳನ್ನು ಪರೀಕ್ಷಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 흥미진진한 미션으로 가득한 Bicycle Rider Simulator에서 실력을 테스트하세요.

short.ml: ആവേശകരമായ ദൗത്യങ്ങൾ നിറഞ്ഞ സൈക്കിൾ റൈഡർ സിമുലേറ്ററിൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ കഴിവുകൾ പരീക്ഷിക്കുക.
short.mr: रोमांचक मोहिमांनी भरलेल्या सायकल रायडर सिम्युलेटरमध्ये आपल्या कौशल्यांची चाचणी घ्या.

short.ro: Testați-vă abilitățile în Bicycle Rider Simulator plin de misiuni interesante.
short.ru: Проверьте свои навыки в Bicycle Rider Simulator, полном увлекательных миссий.

short.sw: Jaribu ujuzi wako katika Bicycle Rider Simulator kamili ya ujumbe wa kusisimua.
short.ta: அற்புதமான பணிகள் நிறைந்த சைக்கிள் ரைடர் சிமுலேட்டரில் உங்கள் திறன்களை சோதிக்கவும்.
short.te: ఉత్తేజకరమైన మిషన్ లతో నిండిన సైకిల్ రైడర్ సిమ్యులేటర్ లో మీ నైపుణ్యాలను పరీక్షించండి.
short.th: ทดสอบทักษะของคุณใน Bicycle Rider Simulator ที่เต็มไปด้วยภารกิจที่น่าตื่นเต้น
short.tr: Heyecan verici görevlerle dolu Bicycle Rider Simulator'da yeteneklerinizi test edin.
short.uk: Перевірте свої навички в Bicycle Rider Simulator, повному захоплюючих місій.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can't compare pleasure with anything in the world of the bicycle wheels turning slightly, the wind caressing your hair, and walking freely in the town's streets. Bicycle Rider Simulator is an open-world bike simulation that offers this amazing experience of its size. As you leave the tranquil atmosphere of your home, you will be immersed in an adventure surrounded by great sounding.

There are three different bike options available in the game, but only the first one is the starting rights. To use other bikes, you must complete the details in town. Each bike has different abilities and can perform better in varying parts of the town. The games you play to get the bikes will add extra depth and motivate you to pedal to a new goal in each campaign.

One of the most exciting aspects of the game is the checkpoint missions. When you accept a task, you run all checkpoints within the recorded time. As you pedal fast, the roar of the wind will ring in your ears, and the adrenaline will rise as you pass through its checkpoint. If you complete the mission before the time runs out, you will earn valuable rewards and work your way toward new missions.

Treasure pots hidden in the town await discovery. While quests are roaming outside, you can find these hidden treasure chests, especially by observing your surroundings. The great rewards will make your cycling experience even more valuable when you find the packages.

Bicycle Rider Simulator offers a treasure trove to cycling enthusiasts and those interested in sports games. This extraordinary experience, expanded by bike games, will reveal you magnificently on the town's streets with its different graphics, unique sound change, and dynamic gameplay. Turn the pedals, race with the wind, and collect rewards to become the fastest biker in town.

How To Play
You can use the WASD keys to move the bicycle. You have to use the mouse to browse the environment. You can also go by lifting the front of the bicycle with the CTRL key.

Bicycle Rider Simulator Game Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 3D Environment
✓ 3 Different Motocycle
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Bicycle Rider Simulator Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
